body_html:
there's not a lot of information in this issue, but I can guess what it is. Try this:

conda update conda; conda install pytorch -c pytorch

It's a known issue with old conda which didn't support organization channels.

there's not a lot of information in this issue, but I can guess what it is. Try this:
conda update conda; conda install pytorch -c pytorch

body:
there's not a lot of information in this issue, but I can guess what it is. Try this:

`conda update conda; conda install pytorch -c pytorch`

It's a known issue with old `conda` which didn't support organization channels.
